name: The Faceless City
description:
Our game shows a glimpse into a world in which cities are controlled by godlike beings called Malignancies. “The Faceless City” is cursed by a Malignancy that steals the faces of its inhabitants. In our single-player Flash-style minigame you play as this Malignancy, watching from below as your city’s inhabitants become more beautiful waiting for the perfect moment to steal their faces for your collection. 

  • Mouse-Only Controls
  • Timed Day to Night Cycle
  • Progression Point System
  • Arcade-like Minigame
  • Steal faces! 3 levels of faces each with set points; the more beautiful, the more points!
  • Bonus mini comic intro

Designed by Kaelan DM. Art by Erica Lee.
